Class MetricsRuleAnalysis

  • java.lang.Object
    • classes.MetricsRuleAnalysis
  • public class MetricsRuleAnalysis
extends java.lang.Object
    This class allows the user to obtain boolean results based on the calculated metrics and the chosen rule
    Author:
    Susana Polido, Tiago Mendes, Pedro Pinheiro

    • Constructor Detail

      • MetricsRuleAnalysis

        public MetricsRuleAnalysis​(java.util.List<MethodData> methodsData,
                           java.util.List<Rule> rules)
        MetricsRuleAnalysis constructor

        Analyzes and stores the detection of Code Smells based on an ArrayList of Rules and another of MethodData

        Parameters:
        methodsData - List of MethodData objects
        rules - List of Rule objects
        See Also:
        MethodData, Rule

      • getResults

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String[]> getResults()
        Organizes the information in the MetricsRuleAnalysis object so it can be written in an Excel file

        Creates an ArrayList of String[] which the first position is the Excel header, and the remaining positions will be each method data plus the results of all the detected Code Smells

        Returns:
        an ArrayList of lines for an Excel file creation

      • getCodeSmellResults

        public java.util.List<java.util.List<java.lang.String[]>> getCodeSmellResults()
        Organizes the information in the MetricsRuleAnalysis object separating class Code Smells and method Code Smells

        Creates an ArrayList with two ArrayLists of String[] where the first ArrayList refers only to class Code Smells and the second ArrayList to the method Code Smells Each of these ArrayList contains the respective header followed by the results of all the respective detected Code Smells

        Returns:
        an ArrayList of ArrayLists of lines to create two tables

      • getClassSmells

        private java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getClassSmells()
        Gets the ArrayList of all class Code Smells names present in the map
        Returns:
        ArrayList of the names of the class Code Smells

      • getMethodSmells

        private java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getMethodSmells()
        Gets the ArrayList of all method Code Smells names present in the map
        Returns:
        ArrayList of the names of the method Code Smells

      • getClassHeader

        private java.lang.String[] getClassHeader()
        Gets the header for the getCodeSmellResults' first ArrayList
        Returns:
        String array of "Class" plus the names of all class Code Smells

      • getMethodHeader

        private java.lang.String[] getMethodHeader()
        Gets the header for the getCodeSmellResults' second ArrayList
        Returns:
        String array of "ID","Method" plus the names of all method Code Smells
